definition: prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
woman who looks after small children/(old) female tutor

sentences.english: OXOM and ASSAM thoroughly one more time.
The Assamese variety can grow 18 meters high and lives about 40 years.
sentences.chinese: 阿萨姆的品种能长到18公尺高并存活约40年。

sentences.english: Assam is the home of the largest concentration Asiatic elephants in the world.
sentences.chinese: 阿萨姆邦是世界上最大的亚洲象聚居地。

sentences.english: English Breakfast tea is my favourite, Assam tea.
sentences.chinese: 英式早茶是我的最爱，阿萨姆红茶。

sentences.english: Assem Abdel Maged says outward demeanor could be misleading.
sentences.chinese: 阿萨姆说，外在的行为可能使人误解。

definition: Sumatra, one of the Indonesian islands
Kenya (Tw) (written as 肯尼亞|肯尼亚 in PRC)
variant of 蘇門答臘|苏门答腊[Su1 men2 da2 la4]
Punjab state of India/Punjab province of Pakistan
Guatemala/see also 瓜地馬拉|瓜地马拉[Gua1 di4 ma3 la1]
Ladakh, the eastern part of Jammu and Kashmir in northwest India, adjacent to Kashmir and Tibet, know as "Little Tibet"
